parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Specify the selling price to shop to want to access. This needs to be related to a shop bound to your partner authorization

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Error message if the error exists

response_fields.name: warn
response_fields.description: This is to indicate whether the list is more than 24 hours. If this field is true, you may need to update the cache for a better performance

response_fields.name: next_offset
response_fields.description: The identifier of the item set

response_fields.name: item_set_list
response_fields.description: The items of the item set

response_fields.name: item_count
response_fields.description: The number of items in the item set

error_codes.description: The API's req parameter is invalid

notes: The documentation shows both request and response parameters clearly, along with error codes. The API appears to be for retrieving item sets with pagination support (given the next_offset parameter).
